column4: hi i have a problem with the software center from ubuntu 9.1 since installation. its not posibel to instal software with it. i can see lots of programs but the software install link is missing for every program. i installed the same version fron cd on another pc and there it works very well.
I had the same problem for a couple days try running updates and getting new packages from synaptic
cliff i installed sofar all packages
did you try reinstalling the sofware center from synaptic too?
yes - menu - software center - games - chess - .... no download link
cliff how can i install it again
thats the problem, there is no button :)
go to synaptic look up software center completely remove and then install it again. See if it works...
also see if your installed version is 1.0.3 (that's the one that's worked for me)
the remove appears but the install button is missing :)
cliff fron the web site or fron synaptic thats just on my pc?
from the one on your pc
for items that are installed yes, but for that are not installed is missing the install button
cliff ok i will try thx for help so far
i will try to deinstall and reinstall it with synaptic
cliff well great thx so far for ya help, very kind. i will inform if i manage the problem
the remove appears but the install button is missing :)
no problem. same thing happened to me...
